bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there are foldable object and soft object together, don't pack a foldable object into the box
goals.3: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
rules.4: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
